Package oracle.kubernetes.operator.work

Interface ComponentEx

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Component
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Container, Packet

    public interface ComponentEx
extends Component
    Extended version of Component. Allows component to return multiple SPI implementations through an Iterable.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      <S> java.lang.Iterable<S> getIterableSPI​(java.lang.Class<S> spiType)
      Gets an iterator of implementations of the specified SPI.

      • Methods inherited from interface oracle.kubernetes.operator.work.Component

        createFor, getSPI

    • Method Detail

      • getIterableSPI

        <S> java.lang.Iterable<S> getIterableSPI​(java.lang.Class<S> spiType)
        Gets an iterator of implementations of the specified SPI. This method works as a kind of directory service for SPIs, allowing various components to define private contract and talk to each other. However unlike Component.getSPI(java.lang.Class), this method can support cases where there is an ordered collection (defined by Iterable of implementations. The SPI contract should define whether lookups are for the first appropriate implementation or whether all returned implementations should be used.
        Type Parameters:
        S - SPI type
        Parameters:
        spiType - SPI class
        Returns:
        non-null Iterable of the SPI's provided by this object. Iterator may have no values.
